nodes.documentation:
@title Extension of Partial-Lock-Commit-Reveal Voting scheme with ERC20 tokens to include non-ERC20 token
@author Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley, borrowed heavily from Cem Ozer, Aspyn Palatnick, Yorke Rhodes
nodes.name: PLCRVoting
setup
getAvailableTokens
requestVotingRights

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraw _numTokens ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights
@param _numTokens The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights
nodes.name: withdrawVotingRights

nodes.documentation:
@dev Unlocks tokens locked in unrevealed vote where poll has ended
@param _pollID Integer identifier associated with the target poll
nodes.name: rescueTokens

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct DLL.Data storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)
function (struct DLL.Data storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)

isPassed

pollEnded

revealPeriodActive

function (struct DLL.Data storage pointer,uint256) view returns (uint256)
